docs.title: Rafikey User Guide
docs.text:
Welcome to Rafikey, your AI-powered SRHR (Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights) chatbot platform.

Use the following URLs to access Rafikey: - askrafikey.com → Public website and chat entry point - chat.askrafikey.com → Chat login and guest access - admin.askrafikey.com → Admin dashboard for analytics, content, and gamification

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
1. Visit chat.askrafikey.com
  2. Choose Sign Up or Log In
  3. Explore the chatbot or dashboard depending on your role

docs.title: Video Walkthroughs
docs.text:
• Rafikey Chatbot – Desktop Login
  • Rafikey Chatbot – Mobile Setup
  • Rafikey Admin Login

docs.title: Register or Log In
docs.text:
1. Go to chat.askrafikey.com
  2. Choose Sign Up or Log In
  3. Follow prompts for email verification and 2FA (if required)

You can start as a guest and create an account later to save progress.

docs.title: Password Reset
docs.text: If you forget your password: - Click Forgot Password? on the login page - A reset link will be sent to your registered email

docs.title: Profile Setup
docs.text:
Fill in the “Let’s Get to Know You Better” section to personalize responses.

Tip: Adding optional data helps the chatbot tailor answers to your SRHR needs.

docs.title: Admin Dashboard
docs.text: Access at admin.askrafikey.com

docs.title: Dashboard Overview
docs.text:
The admin dashboard includes: - Dashboard: View key metrics - Resource Management: Add, edit, or publish SRHR content - Analysis: View engagement and AARRR metrics - Admins: Manage user roles - Gamification: Create quizzes, badges, and engagement rules

Tab Purpose Key Actions Dashboard Monitor AMU, retention, NPS Filter and export reports Resource Management Manage SRHR content Add/edit/publish Analysis Deep-dive analytics Export CSV/XLSX Admins Manage user roles Add/Edit/Delete Gamification Add games and quizzes Configure & enable

docs.title: Adding an Admin
docs.text:
1. Go to Admins tab
  2. Click Add Admin
  3. Enter email, username, password, and registration code
  4. Assign a role and save

docs.title: Adding Resources
docs.text:
1. Navigate to Resource Management → Add Resource
  2. Add Title, Tags, and Content or URL
  3. Click Publish

Example: Add “Emergency contraception basics” with tags contraception, emergency, youth

docs.title: Desktop
docs.text:
• Tabs: New Chat, Settings, Learn More, Play, and Messages
  • Access Settings (bottom left) to toggle light/dark mode or log out

docs.title: Play & Learn
docs.text: Start quizzes or role-play scenarios to test your SRHR knowledge.

docs.title: Learn More
docs.text: Access SRHR topics and chat to ask questions directly.

docs.title: Mobile
docs.text:
• Tabs: New Chat, Quick Access, Play, Messages
  • Settings: Access via top-right three-dot menu
  • Start or resume chats from previous sessions

docs.title: Glossary
docs.text:
• Gamification: Reward system for engagement
  • AARRR: Acquisition, Activation, Retention, Referral, Revenue
  • PWA: Progressive Web App
  • RAG: Retrieval-Augmented Generation
  • RBAC: Role-Based Access Control

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text:
• askrafikey.com
  • chat.askrafikey.com
  • admin.askrafikey.com
  • DHCK Work Plan

docs.title: Efficiency Hacks
docs.text:
• Save analysis filters as presets
  • Batch content edits before publishing
  • Use keyboard shortcuts (Tab, Enter)

docs.title: Customization
docs.text:
• Start with 1–2 quizzes before scaling gamification
  • Pin common dashboard metrics for faster access

docs.title: Common Pitfalls
docs.text:
• Avoid large untagged resources
  • Avoid deleting active content without replacements
  • If the service finder shows no results, check provider data

docs.title: FAQs
docs.text:
How do I recover a deleted resource? → Restore from Resource Management history if soft-deleted; otherwise, recreate it.

What if the chat doesn’t respond? → Check network connection, backend status, and rate limits.

Why don’t my changes appear? → Ensure “Publish” was clicked. Refresh or wait for cache to update.

Analytics stopped updating after deployment? → Confirm analytics keys and events are configured properly.

Admin can’t log in? → Verify invite, assigned role, and 2FA completion.

docs.title: Dashboard
docs.text:
• Apply date filters to analyze AMU, retention, engagement, and conversion
  • Save presets for weekly reviews

docs.title: Resource Management
docs.text:
• Add, edit, or delete SRHR content
  • Use clear tags to enhance discoverability

docs.title: Analysis
docs.text:
• Run AARRR reports and export CSV/XLSX
  • Review engagement depth and referral conversions

docs.title: Gamification
docs.text:
• Add new quizzes and badges
  • Track user participation rates

docs.title: For Users
docs.text:
• Click Start Chat on askrafikey.com
  • Pick a topic or ask a question
  • Optionally share location for nearby services
  • Rate the helpfulness of responses

docs.title: AskRafikey.com Landing Page
docs.text:
Visit askrafikey.com for: - Information about Rafikey and coalition partners - Chatbot access - Contact details - Privacy and terms of use

You can also start chatting directly by clicking “Ask Rafikey” on any page.

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
If issues persist: - Review logs for backend errors - Check browser console for blocked requests - Contact the admin team for escalated issues

Support Contact: 📧 naijeria@mamatech.co.ke

docs.title: Changelog
docs.text: Maintain a simple changelog of releases, new features, and fixes.

docs.title: Feedback
docs.text: Use the Feedback Form in the site footer or dashboard. Weekly review cadence ensures user input feeds into the backlog.

docs.title: Contribute
docs.text: Use GitHub Issues for: - Bug reports - Feature requests - Suggestions for analytics improvements
